translation: Shining by the functions of all the senses, yet without being attached to them; unattached, yet supporting all; devoid of qualities, yet the experiencer of them.
commentary: 13.15 shining by the functions of all senses? devoid of all senses (yet) without the senses? unattached unattached? Sarvabhrut (yet) supporting all? f and? Eve even? Nirgunam devoid of alities? gunabhoktri (yet) experiencer of the alities? f and.Commentary Brahman sees without eyes? hears without ears? smells without a nose? eats without mouth? feels without skin? grasps without hands?
